description:
Windows Password Reset Tool

Active@ Password Changer is a solution designed for resetting local user
password and account attributes on Windows XP, Vista, Server 2003 / 2008 / 2012
/ 2016 / 2019 / 2022, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11 systems in
case of Administratorâ€™s password is forgotten, lost or user account has been
blocked, disabled or locked out.

You will not need to re-install and re-configure operating system in this case.

With Active@ Password Changer you can log in as a particular user with an empty
password.
- Latest recovery Kernel 15.1.14 with many improvements
- Minor bug fixes and improvements
- The latest WinPE-based Active@ Boot Disk (Windows 11 24H2 code base)
- The latest Linux Boot Disk based on openSUSE Leap 15.6
